name: Mark Scout
quote: Every time you find yourself here, it's because you chose to come back.

name: Helly R.
quote: If you tell me I'm not a person one more time, I swear to God I will scream.

name: Irving Bailiff
quote: There is a handbook, and in it are rules.

name: Dylan G.
quote: I get to see my kid? How do I get to see my kid?

name: Mr. Milchick
quote: You’re not your Audi. You’re you.

name: Harmony Cobel
quote: We must serve Kier in all we do.

name: Burt Goodman
quote: The love we feel for him, and for each other, is a perfect and kind love.

name: Mark Scout
quote: None of this is real, is it?

name: Helly R.
quote: You’re not a person. You’re not real.

name: Dylan G.
quote: This is Perpetuity. It’s a museum about Kier Eagan. It’s dumb.
